00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Freshclam extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'freshclam';
00042 
00043     function Freshclam()
00044     {
00045         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Freshclam logs details of each virus update session. Version warnings may not be critical as mentioned in the logs as well.');
00046         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('You may want to customize the frequency of database checks. Also make sure you have chosen a database mirror close to you.');
00047     
00048         $this->Config = array(
00049             'Checks' => array(
00050                 'title' => _TITLE2('Database Checks'),
00051                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Number of database checks per day.
00052         Default: 12 (every two hours)'),
00053                 ),
00054             'MaxAttempts' => array(
00055                 'title' => _TITLE2('Max Attempts'),
00056                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('How many attempts to make before giving up.
00057         Default: 3 (per mirror)'),
00058                 ),
00059             'SafeBrowsing' => array(
00060                 'title' => _TITLE2('Safe Browsing'),
00061                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('This option enables support for Google Safe Browsing. When activated for the first time, freshclam will download a new database file (safebrowsing.cvd) which will be automatically loaded by clamd and clamscan during the next reload, provided that the heuristic phishing detection is turned on. This database includes information about websites that may be phishing sites or possible sources of malware. When using this option, it\'s mandatory to run freshclam at least every 30 minutes.
00062         Default: disabled'),
00063                 ),
00064             'LogVerbose' => array(
00065                 'title' => _TITLE2('Log Verbose'),
00066                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Enable verbose logging.
00067         Default: disabled'),
00068                 ),
00069             'DNSDatabaseInfo' => array(
00070                 'title' => _TITLE2('DNS Database Info'),
00071                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Use DNS to verify virus database version. Freshclam uses DNS TXT records to verify database and software versions. With this directive you can change the database verification domain.
00072         Default: enabled, pointing to current.cvd.clamav.net'),
00073                 ),
00074             'HTTPProxyServer' => array(
00075                 'title' => _TITLE2('HTTP Proxy Server'),
00076                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Proxy settings
00077         Default: disabled'),
00078                 ),
00079             'HTTPProxyPort' => array(
00080                 'title' => _TITLE2('HTTP Proxy Port'),
00081                 ),
00082             'HTTPProxyUsername' => array(
00083                 'title' => _TITLE2('HTTP Proxy Username'),
00084                 ),
00085             'HTTPProxyPassword' => array(
00086                 'title' => _TITLE2('HTTP Proxy Password'),
00087                 ),
00088             'LocalIPAddress' => array(
00089                 'title' => _TITLE2('Local IP Address'),
00090                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Use aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd as client address for downloading databases. Useful for multi-homed systems.
00091         Default: Use OS\'es default outgoing IP address.'),
00092                 ),
00093             'Debug' => array(
00094                 'title' => _TITLE2('Debug'),
00095                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('Enable debug messages in libclamav.
00096         Default: disabled'),
00097                 ),
00098         );
00099     }
00100     
00101     function FormatLogCols(&$cols)
00102     {
00103         $cols['Log']= wordwrap($cols['Log'], 100, '<br />', TRUE);
00104     }
00105 }

00107 $View= new Freshclam();

00111 function PrintDatabaseMirrorsForm()
00112 {
00113     global $View, $Class;
00114     ?>
00115     <tr class="<?php echo $Class ?>">
00116         <td class="title">
00117             <?php echo _TITLE2('Database Mirrors').':' ?>
00118         </td>
00119         <td>
00120             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00121                 <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00122                 <select name="Mirrors[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 50px;">
00123                     <?php
00124                     if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetMirrors')) {
00125                         foreach ($output as $mirror) {
00126                             ?>
00127                             <option value="<?php echo $mirror ?>"><?php echo $mirror ?></option>
00128                             <?php
00129                         }
00130                     }
00131                     ?>
00132                 </select>
00133                 <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00134                 <input type="text" name="MirrorToAdd" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="21"/>
00135                 <input type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00136             </form>
00137         </td>
00138         <td class="none">
00139             <?php
00140             PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2("Here you can enter db.XY.clamav.net for a mirror close to you. Replace XY with your country code. See http://www.iana.org/cctld/cctld-whois.htm for the full list.
00141 
00142 Not shown in this list is database.clamav.net, which is a round-robin record and points to ClamAV's most reliable mirrors. It is used as a fall back in case db.XY.clamav.net is not working."));
00143             ?>
00144         </td>
00145     </tr>
00146     <?php
00147 }
